name: SPEC_WORKFLOW_STEP_HX
description: This table contains information about the workflow step history of a specimen.

columns.name: SPECIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the specimen record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CM_PHY_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this record or line. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: TEST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the test which was performed with this workflow step.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_STEP_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the workflow step.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_STEP_RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the node record.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_STEP_TYPE_RECORD_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the event type corresponding to the workflow step.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_STEP_TYPE_RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the event template.

columns.name: COMPLETE_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time at which the workflow step action occurred.

columns.name: COMPLETE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user responsible for the workflow step action.

columns.name: COMPLETE_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_STEP_RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result snapshot taken when the user completed the workflow step.

columns.name: WORKFLOW_STEP_EVENT_RECORD_ID
columns.description: Stores the event associated with the workflow step action

columns.name: WORKFLOW_STEP_EVENT_RECORD_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of the event template.
